sentences.sentence: Any deficiency or cursoriness of the management will lead to grave consequences.
sentences.translation: 任何管理上的不足和疏忽，都会对活动造成不可估计的后果。

sentences.sentence: What if the system administer failed to update the latest system leaks or as a experience-shorter or just cursoriness.
sentences.translation: 而且，由于系统管理员的疏忽或缺乏经验，导致旧有的漏洞依然存在。
